title: Grilled Prosciutto-Wrapped Peaches with Burrata and Basil

Ingredients.1: 2  ripe, sweet (but not soft) freestone peaches

Ingredients.2: 3 thin slices  prosciutto, or more as needed, torn into ribbons

Ingredients.3: 8 small bamboo skewers, soaked in water 20 minutes

Ingredients.5: 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling

Ingredients.7: 1 Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

Ingredients.8: 1 tablespoon finely sliced fresh basil leaves

Directions.1: Preheat an outdoor grill at medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.

Directions.2: Cut peaches in half and remove peach stones. Cut each half in half again.

Directions.3: Wrap prosciutto around each peach section; secure with small bamboo skewers.

Directions.4: Grill peaches, turning often, until prosciutto gets a little crisp around the edges and peaches begin to caramelize, about 6 minutes.

Directions.5: To serve, spoon burrata onto serving plates. Remove peaches from skewers; place several grilled peaches around cheese. Drizzle with olive oil. Top with a sprinkle of sea salt and pepper; garnish with basil.
